00045 void RigidBody::assembleMassMatrix( lmx::Matrix< data_type > & globalMass )
00046 {
00047   int nodesSize = nodes.size();
00048   int i, j, m, n;
00049 
00050   for ( i=0; i<nodesSize; ++i )
00051   {
00052     for ( j=0; j<nodesSize; ++j )
00053     {
00054       for ( m=0; m<Simulation::getDim(); ++m )
00055       {
00056         for ( n=0; n<Simulation::getDim(); ++n )
00057         {
00058           globalMass( Simulation::getDim()*nodes[i]->getNumber() + m,
00059                       Simulation::getDim()*nodes[j]->getNumber() + n)
00060               += massMatrix.readElement(Simulation::getDim()*i + m,
00061                                         Simulation::getDim()*j + n);
00062         }
00063       }
00064     }
00065   }
00066 }
00067 
00068 void RigidBody::assembleExternalForces
00069 ( lmx::Vector< data_type > & globalExternalForces )
00070 {
00071   int nodesSize = nodes.size();
00072   int i, m;
00073 
00074   for( i=0; i<nodesSize; ++i )
00075   {
00076     for( m=0; m<Simulation::getDim(); ++m )
00077     {
00078       globalExternalForces( Simulation::getDim()*nodes[i]->getNumber() + m)
00079           += externalForces.readElement(Simulation::getDim()*i + m);
00080     }
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void RigidBody::outputStep
00085 ( const lmx::Vector< data_type > & q, const lmx::Vector< data_type > & qdot )
00086 {
00087   if( computeEnergy )
00088   {
00089     /*potential, kinetic, elastic, total*/
00090     energy.push_back( new lmx::Vector<data_type>( 4 ) ); 
00091     energy.back()->fillIdentity( 0. );
00092 
00093     int nodesSize = nodes.size();
00094     int i, n, j, m;
00095 
00096     for( i=0; i<nodesSize; ++i )
00097     {
00098       for( n=0; n<Simulation::getDim() ; ++n)
00099       {
00100         /*potential*/
00101         energy.back()->operator()(0) 
00102             -= q.readElement( Simulation::getDim()*nodes[i]->getNumber() + n )
00103             * externalForces.readElement(Simulation::getDim()*i + n);
00104 
00105         /*kinetic*/
00106         for (j=0; j<nodesSize; ++j)
00107         {
00108           for (m=0; m<Simulation::getDim(); ++m)
00109           {
00110             energy.back()->operator()(1)
00111             += 0.5
00112             * qdot.readElement( Simulation::getDim()*nodes[i]->getNumber() + n )
00113             * massMatrix.readElement( Simulation::getDim()*i + n, Simulation::getDim()*j + m)
00114             * qdot.readElement( Simulation::getDim()*nodes[j]->getNumber() + m );
00115           }
00116         }
00117       }
00118     }
00119     //no Elastic
00120     /*Total*/
00121     energy.back()->operator()(3) = energy.back()->readElement(0)
00122                                  + energy.back()->readElement(1)
00123                                  + energy.back()->readElement(2); 
00124   }
00125 }
00126 
00127 void RigidBody::outputStep( const lmx::Vector< data_type > & q )
00128 {
00129   if( computeEnergy ){
00130     energy.push_back( new lmx::Vector<data_type>( 4 ) ); //potential, kinetic, elastic
00131 
00132     energy.back()->fillIdentity( 0. );
00133 
00134     int nodesSize = nodes.size();
00135     int i, n;
00136     for (i=0; i<nodesSize; ++i){
00137       for (n=0; n<Simulation::getDim(); ++n){
00138         energy.back()->operator()(0) //potential
00139             -= q.readElement( Simulation::getDim()*nodes[i]->getNumber() + n )
00140             * externalForces.readElement(Simulation::getDim()*i + n);
00141       }
00142     }
00143     //no kinetic, no Elastic
00144     energy.back()->operator()(3) = energy.back()->readElement(0) + energy.back()->readElement(1) + energy.back()->readElement(2); //total
00145 
00146   }
00147 }

00149 void RigidBody::outputToFile( std::ofstream * outFile )
00150 {
00151   if( computeEnergy ){
00152     std::vector< lmx::Vector<data_type>* >::iterator itEnergy;
00153     int i, vectorSize;
00154 
00155     *outFile << "ENERGY " << title << endl;
00156     for( itEnergy = energy.begin();
00157          itEnergy!= energy.end();
00158          ++itEnergy
00159        )
00160     {
00161       vectorSize = (*itEnergy)->size();
00162       for( i=0; i<vectorSize; ++i){
00163         *outFile << (*itEnergy)->readElement(i) << " ";
00164       }
00165       *outFile << endl;
00166     }
00167   }
00168 }

00170 void RigidBody::writeBoundaryNodes( std::vector<Node*>& boundary_nodes )
00171 {
00172   std::vector<Node*>::iterator it_nodes;
00173   for( it_nodes = this->nodes.begin();
00174        it_nodes!= nodes.end();
00175        ++it_nodes )
00176   {
00177     boundary_nodes.push_back( *it_nodes );
00178   }
00179 }
00180 
00181 void RigidBody::writeBoundaryConnectivity( std::vector< std::vector<Node*> >& connectivity_nodes )
00182 {
00183   std::vector<Node*>::iterator it_nodes;
00184   connectivity_nodes.push_back( std::vector< Node* >() );
00185   for( it_nodes = this->nodes.begin();
00186        it_nodes!= nodes.end();
00187        ++it_nodes )
00188   {
00189     connectivity_nodes.back().push_back( *it_nodes );
00190   }
00191 }
